name: Gorodki
overview:
Electronic sport simulator based on TIA-MC1 (colour multiframe TV arcade machine with changeable games) platform for one player. Usually located in cinemas and slot machine halls. Simulates the same-name traditional Russian game. The aim of the game is to knock down 15 figures. The machine was designed to train accuracy and eye estimation.

Produced by Terminal PO, Vinnitsa (Ukraine). In the Soviet times the plant specialized in monitors for the largest research institutes and defence industry. Museum got the machine from Kireyevsk amusement park. Year of production - 1988.
